attributes.action: building schools for the future sandwell
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned wish this government department to re instate the building schools for the future programme funding that was cut short of its completion .
Primary schools in Sandwell are in desperate need to use the investment to modernise and develop the way early years education is delivered and the buildings will be vitally important in this process to accommodate the increased demand of school places for children entering the education system . We must insist that the funding programme must start with immediate affect  as time wasted will fail our countries children and our future economic development for generations to come .
